original_title: Soltanto un nome nei titoli di testa
overview: A documentary portrait of screenwriter and author Ugo Pirro, one of Elio Petri´s consistent collaborators (e.g. Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion and We Still Kill the Old Way) and co-author of films by Carlo Lizzani, Vittorio De Sica and Lina Wertmüller. Karlovy Vary IFF 2014
title: Soltanto un nome nei titoli di testa
